textBox.richText: As seasoned travellers to New York City we decided to opt for a slight destination change with our accommodation. Instead of staying on Manhattan we headed over the East River and set up camp in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. The ‘Burg* as we’re affectionately calling it is an amazing place. It reminds us of the alternative suburbs of Fitzroy/Collingwood/East Brunswick in Melbourne. Lots of great shops, cafe’s and bars away from the hustle and bustle of Manhattan. The contrast is amazing! * NOTE: The name The Burg comes from dropping Williams from the front - not because we can buy Ice on every street corner
